name: KRAKEN (itch) (Dave)
description:
Klick with your mouse as soon as your are on the surface to move the kraken.

GOOGLE CHROME/IRON is highly recommended!

This game was made during the Monster Mash 2014.

Endless sea, millions of blood-filled tourists and a hungry kraken. All mashed with a 70s horror classic. 

I had alot of fun making my first game music ever with an old CASIO SA-21.

Due to my lack of time it ended up in being "just" a KRAKEN SIMULATOR. There is alot of blood included. I don't know what got into me there. 

http://curlott.me
